title: GermlineStructuralV-nf pipeline parameters
description: Multi-caller germline structural variant calling pipeline

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Path to tab-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.
input.help_text: You will need to create a design file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline. Use this parameter to specify its location. It has to be a comma-separated file with 3 columns, and a header row.

reference_data.title: Reference data
reference_data.description: Reference genome files required for SV calling

ref.description: Path to reference genome in FASTA format. Pipeline assumes index files are housed in the same directory.

intervals.description: Full path and name of the intervals file for Manta (bed format).

vcf_merging_options.title: VCF merging options
vcf_merging_options.description: Settings for merging caller-VCFs per sample with SURVIVOR

survivorConsensus.description: Number of supportive callers require to report event.

survivorType.description: Requirement for callers to agree on event type before merging calls (default: yes[1])

survivorMaxDist.description: Maximum distance between SVs to merge

survivorStrand.description: Requirement for callers to identify event on same strand before merging calls (default: yes[1])

extraMantaFlags.description: Additionally specify any valid Manta flags

extraSmooveFlags.description: Additionally specify any valid Smoove flags

extraTidditSvFlags.description: Additionally specify any valid Tiddit SV flags

extraTidditCovFlags.description: Additionally specify any valid Tiddit Cov flags

extraAnnotsvFlags.description: Additionally specify any valid AnnotSV flags

annotsvMode.description: Specify full, split, or both for AnnotSV output mode

annotsvDir.description: Full path to the directory housing the prepared Annotations_human directory for AnnotSV

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.
